description: Welcome to my portfolio! I'm a mobile and frontend developer with expertise in iOS, Android, and React. My goal is to create beautiful and functional applications that exceed my client's expectations. Let's work together to bring your ideas to life!
headerSectionTitle: Frontend & Mobile developer and a codoholic person
headerSectionDescription: My name is Ali Oliaee and I am studying for a bachelor's degree in computer engineering at Qiet. I'm 21 and I'm interested messing with computers and tech stuff. The purpose of this portfolio is the presentation of the personal projects I have worked on, and the skills I have acquired over the years.
name: Name
